revised_title: Magnetic Disturbances at Kew: Non-Cyclic Changes and Diurnal Inequalities
tldr: The author investigates magnetic disturbances at Kew, focusing on non-cyclic changes and diurnal inequalities. The study reveals a complex relationship between magnetic disturbances and non-cyclic changes, with oscillations in declination and a prevalence of disturbed days, even during seemingly quiet periods.
